specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: We will give away bottles of water and tracts to MMF concert goers from the front lawn Thursday, 8/29 from 6-8 PM; Friday, 8/30 from 2-6 PM; and Saturday, 8/31 from 2-6 PM. Sign up in the foyer and see Ryan about donating cases of water.
We will meet at Rawlings-Stinson park for our Sunday evening services on September 1 and 22. Bring a lawn chair (or two!) and come ready to sing so others may hear of our glorious Lord!
